name: R-Lab Destruction Mission: 01
description:
One Level vertical shooter style, not very fast phased but rather more like learn the enemies layout to prevent being hit so you can get to challenge the boss .  
The story is about an agent with the mission to destroy a secret facility that is experimenting with an alien form to use them as weapons (later missions).
Since it is the first mission, arsenal maybe limited but enought to fullfil the task.
